actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for grade retention benefits for certain employees whose positions are reduced in grade.

summary.text: Entitles a Federal employee whose position is reduced in grade to have the grade of such position treated as if such reduction had not occurred so long as such employee without a break in service. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 5366)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for grade retention benefits for certain employees whose positions are reduced in grade.
